sys_script_include.name: returnParentGroupUsers

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_39f8c6cb1b4225105bdeed71f54bcb3c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_liisa_support_ca.returnParentGroupUsers</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>returnParentGroupUsers</name><script><![CDATA[var returnParentGroupUsers = Class.create();
returnParentGroupUsers.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    returnParentGroupUsers: function() {
		
		gs.info('JCE entering');
		var arr = [];
        var grName = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
        grName.addEncodedQuery('parent=' + current.assignment_group);
        grName.query();

        if (!grName.next()) {
           
            var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
            gr.addQuery('group', current.assignment_group);
            gr.addActiveQuery();
            gr.query();
            while (gr.next()) {

                arr.push(gr.getValue('user'));
            }
           gs.info('JCE ALL  query = ' + 'sys_idIN' + arr);
            return 'sys_idIN' + arr;
        } else {
           
            var gr1 = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
            gr1.addQuery('group.parent', current.assignment_group);
            gr1.addActiveQuery();
            gr1.query();
            while (gr1.next()) {

                arr.push(gr1.getValue('user'));
            }
           gs.info('JCE ALL  query = ' + 'sys_idIN' + arr);
            return 'sys_idIN' + arr;
        }	 
    },

    type: 'returnParentGroupUsers'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-11 15:54:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>39f8c6cb1b4225105bdeed71f54bcb3c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>returnParentGroupUsers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_39f8c6cb1b4225105bdeed71f54bcb3c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-11 15:54:36</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
